objects.specification: A broad floor surface covered with large stone-textured tiles in earthy brown and gray tones, giving a prehistoric yet polished appearance. The stone finish has subtle natural veining and slight unevenness to evoke an authentic natural environment. The surface complements the dinosaur theme by providing a grounded, organic feel.

A flat ceiling constructed from smooth plaster with a light earthy hue, accented by exposed wooden beams that evoke a rustic prehistoric style. The surface maintains a bright and welcoming atmosphere, reflecting ambient light gently across the room. The combination of plaster and wood provides a balanced, natural ambiance.

A classroom wall featuring a gentle stone texture with warm neutral colors, subtly reminiscent of ancient cave walls. The surface is smooth enough for mounting educational materials yet conveys a rugged, natural feel. It complements the dinosaur theme with a muted backdrop that highlights decor elements.

A classroom wall featuring a gentle stone texture with warm neutral colors, subtly reminiscent of ancient cave walls. The surface is smooth enough for mounting educational materials yet conveys a rugged, natural feel. It complements the dinosaur theme with a muted backdrop that highlights decor elements.

A sturdy wooden desk with a rectangular top, finished in warm earthy tones and accented with subtle stone-like texture along the edges. The desk has slightly rounded corners and visible natural grain patterns, evoking a prehistoric, organic aesthetic. The surface is smooth enough for writing and durable for everyday classroom use.

A matching wooden chair with a solid backrest and four sturdy legs, finished in complementary warm earthy colors with light stone texture highlights. The seat and back feature gentle contours for comfort, and the natural wood grain is visible, reinforcing the prehistoric theme. The design is simple yet robust.

A large rectangular chalkboard with a deep dark matte surface framed by thick wooden borders featuring a subtle weathered look. The frame has earthy brown tones with slight stone texture accents, providing a sturdy and thematic appearance. The surface is ideal for clear chalk writing and blends with the natural motif.

A compact modern ceiling-mounted projector with a smooth white and gray casing that harmonizes with the classroom’s muted palette. The unit has subtle rounded edges and a minimalistic design, ensuring it remains visually unobtrusive. It includes a small lens aperture and vents, detailed realistically.

An educational dinosaur poster featuring vivid illustrated images of prehistoric dinosaur species, labeled with their scientific names and facts. The poster has a semi-gloss finish and is mounted on a light neutral backing with a thin wooden frame that matches other wooden elements. Colors are bright to attract attention and complement the natural theme.

The poster has a semi-gloss finish and is mounted on a light neutral backing with a thin wooden frame that matches other wooden elements. A large wall mural depicting life-like dinosaur scenes in lush prehistoric landscapes, rendered in vibrant yet natural colors. The artwork spans a wide area and features detailed textures of foliage, dinosaurs, and rocky terrain. The mural has a matte finish to mimic painted cave art and enrich the classroom ambiance.

A large wall mural depicting life-like dinosaur scenes in lush prehistoric landscapes, rendered in vibrant yet natural colors. The artwork spans a wide area and features detailed textures of foliage, dinosaurs, and rocky terrain. The mural has a matte finish to mimic painted cave art and enrich the classroom ambiance.

A realistic 3D dinosaur skeleton replica, meticulously detailed with individual bone structures and joints. The skeleton is rendered in ivory bone color with slight weathering effects. The model stands on a minimal supporting base and evokes a museum-quality display within the classroom.

A potted prehistoric plant resembling ferns with lush green fronds, situated in a simple dark stone-textured pot. The leaves have varied shades of green and subtle vein details, giving a lifelike appearance. The pot has an earthy finish to integrate seamlessly with the overall theme.

A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple open shelves, finished in warm earthy tones and accented with a light stone texture along the edges. The shelves are stocked with books and small dinosaur figurines, adding educational and thematic detail. The design is sturdy and blends with the natural motif.

A simple pendant ceiling light featuring a broad circular shade made of a light stone-textured material, with an inner reflective surface to cast diffuse warm light. The fixture is suspended by a slim metal rod in a subtle bronze finish, complementing the earthy color scheme.

A pair of fabric curtains in a soft muted green hue with a subtle natural leaf motif. The curtains have gentle folds and slight texture, evoking prehistoric foliage. They hang from a simple wooden rod that matches the wooden accents throughout the room.

A compact waste bin made of dark metal with a matte finish and simple cylindrical shape. The bin features minimalistic design with a slightly textured surface, blending functionality with the prehistoric theme. Its neutral color ensures it remains unobtrusive yet accessible.
